channel.title: RS PI Background Change HELP!
channel.description: Ok so for about 4 hours now I have been trying to change the background on my client it is a PI base and I believe it is cache packed as changing the background image in sprites doesn't work so I downloaded toms cache editor and looked on a few tutorials I changed the title.dat in Jagex archives but that didnt do anything also I cant find the background image looking through the cache so I am not sure if my background is changeable or not or if I am just being a noob and looking in the wrong place. I have been searching forums and videos all night and haven't been able to solve this problem I have little experience in coding as I just started a few days ago but I need this fixed any help is appreciated and if you need me to post anything like my cache I will because I need this fixed. I see alot of people giving rep++ to people who help them so I will give that if I can im not sure if you need a certain number of posts for that ( I am also a forum noob) all help is greatly appreciated and thank you for even reading this far I will be checking this post constantly as I am extremely desperate.

item.title: RS PI Background Change HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

I’ll help you out with your Project Insanity Source/Client.

What it does: Change’s your Project Insanity Client background

So, let’s start!
Go to Client folder>‘Then open’>Client.java (Now we can begin)
Search for

comment it out with ‘//’ or if you don’t really get it replace it with this

Now search for this again

and do what I said above! You have now gotten ridden of the flames!
Now time to get rid of the big RuneScape logo in the background.
Still in Client.java search for

and comment it out like so

or delete it!
Now open up Sprite.java and search for

replace that with this

Now still in Sprite.java search for

and delete it! Now we need to add your background image, so go into your Sprites folder and put your background picture, also make sure that it is a .jpg or .jpeg image or it will not work!

Enjoy.

item.title: RS PI Background Change HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Tassos Tassos
item.description:
@Tassos wrote:

Ok so for about 4 hours now I have been trying to change the background on my client it is a PI base and I believe it is cache packed as changing the background image in sprites doesn’t work so I downloaded toms cache editor and looked on a few tutorials I changed the title.dat in Jagex archives but that didnt do anything also I cant find the background image looking through the cache so I am not sure if my background is changeable or not or if I am just being a noob and looking in the wrong place. I have been searching forums and videos all night and haven’t been able to solve this problem I have little experience in coding as I just started a few days ago but I need this fixed any help is appreciated and if you need me to post anything like my cache I will because I need this fixed. I see alot of people giving rep++ to people who help them so I will give that if I can im not sure if you need a certain number of posts for that ( I am also a forum noob) all help is greatly appreciated and thank you for even reading this far I will be checking this post constantly as I am extremely desperate.

Read full topic
